original_text: While Isaiah was still in the middle yard of the palace, the Lord gave him this message:
korean_text: 이사야가 성읍 가운데까지도 이르기 전에 여호와의 말씀이 그에게 임하여 이르시되

sentences.original_text: While Isaiah was still in the middle yard
sentences.korean_translation: 이사야가 아직 중앙 뜰에 있을 때

sentences.original_text: the Lord gave him this message
